caption.p: In vitro anticancer activity of LCO. Antiproliferative effect of increasing doses of LCO at ( a) 24 h, ( b) 48 h, or ( c) 72 h on DA3 murine breast cancer cells. Percentage (%) of cell growth was analyzed by the SRB assay. All data shown are representative of at least three independent experiments. Values represent mean Â± SD.
